page.title: 19POSTAL AND BUS SERVICES
page.content: { THE POST OFFICE:}THE POST OFFICE IS IN{OCHILVIEW SQUARE.}IT SELLS STAMPS, POSTAL ORDERS ETC IN ONE HALF OF THE SHOP,AND IN THE OTHER A LARGE SELECT ION OF FANCY GOODS ARE FOR SALE.THERE ARE 8 POST BOXES SITUATED IN: WEST MAIN STREET (2),DROVE ROAD, WOODEND WALK,BURNS AVENUE, BRIDGE CASTLE ROAD,SOUTH STREET AND OCHILVIEW SQUARE. THERE ARE 5 COLLECTIONS ON WEEKDAYS AND ON SATURDAYS,2.THE MAIL IS TAKEN TO BATHGATE TO BE SORTED. { THE BUS SERVICE:}THE BUS FROM EDINBURGH TO GLASGOW AND VICE VERSA TRAVELS THROUGH:{ BROXBURN,BATHGATE,ARMADALE,AIRDRIE. { TIMES:EDIN.-GLAS.23 MIN.PAST HOUR} {GLAS.-EDIN.26 MIN PAST HOUR BUS STOPS ARE LOCATED NEXT TO THE CROSS IN WEST MAIN STREET.
